author: aldcroft
description:
Description: Converting from IDL, Matlab, and R to NumPyHomepage URL: http://mathesaurus.sourceforge.net/"Mathesaurus" provides a quick reference for switching to open-source mathematical computation environments for computer algebra, numeric processing and data visualisation.  The following conversion guides are available:
NumPy for Matlab users (HTML)
R for Matlab users (HTML)
Numpy for Numeric users (HTML)
Numpy for R users (HTML)
NumPy for IDL users (HTML)
Matlab—Python—R (PDF)
IDL—Python—Matlab (PDF)
All in one list (PDF)
title: mathesaurus
